executiveSummary: Jamie Siminoff pitched his product, Doorbot—the first smartphone-connected video doorbell—on Shark Tank, seeking $700,000 for 10% equity. Despite positive feedback on the product and impressive sales growth, all sharks declined to invest, with Kevin O'Leary offering a royalty-based deal that Jamie ultimately rejected.
nextSteps: Jamie Siminoff plans to continue growing Doorbot independently, likely pursuing venture debt or other funding sources to scale production and marketing.
